name: otu.ai.web
description: AI-powered smart memo application - Write, organize, and recall with AI.

scripts.dev:turbo: git config commit.template commit.template; npm run check-updates; next dev  --turbopack

scripts.tunnel: read -p 'port?:' port; npx cloudflared tunnel --url http://localhost:$port

scripts.update-minor: ncu --target minor -u && npm i && npm run build && npm run dev
